desc: Manage general information used in VERNECT's product and services.

info.title: Profile
info.imageDesc: Updating your profile picture makes it easier for other members to find you
info.name: Name
info.nameDesc: Your name is used for - payment purchase management and account security management.
info.nicknameDesc: Your nickname is shared to other members using VERNECT services

account.title: Account details
account.emailDesc: You cannot change an email address you used for registration

additional.title: Additional user information
additional.desc: The additional user information is used in verification process if the user forgets email address
additional.birthEmpty: Date of birth is not updated
additional.recoveryEmailEmpty: Recovery email address is not updated

imageChangeModal.title: Update profile picture
imageChangeModal.desc: Your profile picture is shared to all them VIRNECT users
imageChangeModal.caution: Up to 5Mb of Jpg or Png files can be uploaded

nameChangeModal.title: Name settings
nameChangeModal.desc: If you change the name the changed name is applied to VIRNECT products and services.
nameChangeModal.caution: * For the purpose of account security frequent name changes may be restricted to the use of products and services. Also updating of changed name may take some time.

message.fail: Failed to update your name please try again later

nicknameChangeModal.title: Edit Nickname
nicknameChangeModal.desc: When edit your nickname it will be applied to our products and services

message.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later

passwordChangeModal.title: Edit password
passwordChangeModal.desc: When changing the password all the logins are logged out from the logged-in devices except the currently used device.
passwordChangeModal.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).

message.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later
message.duplicate: You cannot use the previously used password for your new password
message.invalid:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

message.success: Succesfully updated your date of birth
message.fail: Failed to update your date of birth please try again later

marketInfoReceive.title: Agree to receive promotional offers
marketInfoReceive.contents: Receive emails about VIRNECT's new products services and promotional offers.

message.success: Succesfully updated your promotional marketing agreement
message.fail: Failed to update please try again later

secession.title: Withdrawal
secession.secessionReasonDesk: Select the main reason for withdrawing your membership
secessionSelect: Not satisfied with our products and services
secession.secessionReasonEtc: Please state the reason for your withdrawl from the membership
secession.done: I agree to all the terms of membership withdrawal and proceed with membership withdrawal.

message.fail: Failed to update contact details please try again later.

message.success: Succesfully updated your recovery email address
message.fail: Failed to update your recovery email address please try again later
